title: User login success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid credentials via the login API.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/login with valid username and password.
Receive successful response with authentication token and session established.

title: User logout success
description: Verify that a logged-in user can successfully log out and the session is invalidated.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/logout with valid authentication token.
Receive successful logout response and authentication token is invalidated.

title: Create new gas cylinder record
description: Verify that an authorized user can create a new gas cylinder with valid data.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/master/cylinders with valid cylinder data payload.
Receive response confirming creation and cylinder exists in the listing.

title: Update existing gas cylinder record
description: Verify that an authorized user can update details of an existing gas cylinder.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/master/cylinders with valid updated data and existing cylinder ID.
Receive successful update response and updated data is reflected in the cylinder listing.

title: List gas cylinders
description: Verify that the cylinder listing API returns all cylinders with correct data.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/master/cylinders.
Receive a list of all gas cylinders with correct details as previously created or updated.

title: Import gas cylinder records
description: Verify that bulk import of gas cylinders through import API is processed correctly.

steps.description: Send POST request to import route with a valid batch of cylinder data.
All cylinders are created or updated accordingly, with appropriate success report.

title: Start charging workflow on selected cylinders
description: Ensure that initiating a charging operation on cylinders updates their status correctly.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/work/charging with action=START and valid cylinder IDs.
Verify response success and that cylinder statuses reflect 'charging started'.

title: Complete charging workflow on selected cylinders
description: Ensure that completing charging operations updates cylindersâ€™ status appropriately.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/work/charging with action=COMPLETE and valid cylinder IDs.
Verify response success and that cylinder statuses reflect 'charging completed'.

title: Process delivery action with valid cylinders and customer
description: Verify delivery of cylinders to customers updates delivery status and associations accordingly.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/work/delivery with action=DELIVERY, valid cylinder IDs, and customer ID.
Verify successful response and cylinders marked as delivered to specified customer.

title: Process collection action of cylinders from customer
description: Verify that collection of cylinders updates cylinder status and customer association accurately.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/work/delivery with action=COLLECTION, valid cylinder IDs, and customer ID.
Verify response success and that cylinders are disassociated from the customer and status updated.

title: Retrieve cylinder history logs
description: Verify ability to retrieve complete and accurate history for a specific cylinder.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/history/cylinder with a valid cylinder ID.
Receive comprehensive history data including creation, updates, charging, delivery, and collection events.

title: Generate long term inventory report
description: Verify that the system can generate comprehensive long-term inventory reports reflecting lifecycle data.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/system/reports/long-term.
Receive detailed report covering inventory trends, lifecycle states, and migration statuses.

title: Handle invalid login credentials
description: Verify that login API rejects invalid credentials and returns appropriate error response.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/login with invalid username or password.
Receive error response indicating authentication failure without leaking system details.

title: Fail to update non-existent cylinder
description: Verify system returns an appropriate error when attempting to update a cylinder that does not exist.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/master/cylinders with an unknown cylinder ID.
Receive a 'not found' error response and no operation is performed.

title: Fail charging workflow with invalid cylinder IDs
description: Verify charging action fails when invalid or unknown cylinder IDs are provided.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/work/charging with action=START or COMPLETE and invalid cylinder IDs.
Receive error response indicating invalid cylinder references and no status updates are made.

title: Fail delivery action when customer ID is missing
description: Verify delivery API returns an error if the customerId field is omitted or invalid.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/work/delivery with action=DELIVERY or COLLECTION without customerId.
Receive validation error response and no delivery or collection action is performed.

title: Real-time synchronization between PC and mobile
description: Verify that updates performed on PC are instantly reflected on mobile client and vice versa.

steps.description: Update cylinder data on PC frontend.
Check that mobile frontend reflects the update in real-time without any manual refresh.
Update cylinder status on mobile frontend.
Confirm PC frontend shows updated status immediately.

title: System audit lifecycle data validation
description: Verify that system audit reports lifecycle data integrity and migration status consistently.

steps.description: Request lifecycle and migration status reports via system audit endpoints.
Validate that reports are complete, accurate, and match expected lifecycle states of all cylinders.

title: Debug log and error detection validation
description: Verify that during development and deployment, all detected issues are logged and addressed, achieving near zero defects.

steps.description: Simulate common error scenarios such as invalid API calls, data conflicts, and unexpected input.
Ensure all errors are captured in debug logs, appropriate error messages are returned, and fixes are applied.
Run AI-assisted tests and error detection tools integrated in the system.
Confirm that all identified issues are documented and successfully resolved before production deployment.
